name: Eddy Pierre
bio: According to Boris Kravitz, owner of the Haitian Art Company, Eddy Pierre was born in the mid-1960s and lives in Cap-Haitien. He is a cousin of the artist Michaelle Obin.

Typically, Eddy Pierre's paintings show Haitian market women carrying laden baskets on their heads.  He usually shows them as over-sized compared to the houses and other objects in the painting.  This symbolizes the importance of these women to Haitian society.
